args.natural_language_statement: Translate the following and check correctness: Any infinite cyclic group is isomorphic to the additive group ℤ of integers. Any finite cyclic group is isomorphic to the additive group ℤ_n of integers modulo n, for some positive integer n.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Subgroup
open Finset Nat
open scoped Classical
open Nat
open Subgroup

/-- Any infinite cyclic group is isomorphic to the additive group ℤ of integers. Any finite cyclic group is isomorphic to the additive group ℤ_n of integers modulo n, for some positive integer n. -/
theorem isCyclic_add_int_of_isCyclic {G : Type*} [AddCommGroup G] [IsCyclic G] :
    IsAddCyclic G := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

-- Translation of: Any infinite cyclic group is isomorphic to the additive group ℤ. 
--          Any finite cyclic group is isomorphic to the additive group ℤ_n of integers modulo n.

theorem infinite_cyclic_iso_int (G : Type*) [Group G] [IsCyclic G] [Infinite G] : G ≃ ℤ := by sorry

theorem finite_cyclic_iso_zmod (G : Type*) [Group G] [IsCyclic G] [Fintype G] : ∃ n : ℕ, 0 < n ∧ G ≃ ZMod n := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Any infinite cyclic group is isomorphic to the additive group ℤ. -/
theorem infinite_cyclic_iso_int (G : Type*) [Group G] [IsCyclic G] [Infinite G] : G ≃ ℤ := by
  sorry

/-- Any finite cyclic group is isomorphic to the additive group ℤ_n of integers modulo n, for some positive integer n. -/
theorem finite_cyclic_iso_zmod (G : Type*) [Group G] [IsCyclic G] [Fintype G] : ∃ n : ℕ, 0 < n ∧ G ≃ ZMod n := by
  sorry

theorem finite_cyclic_iso_zmod (G : Type*) [Group G] [IsCyclic G] [Fintype G] : ∃ n : ℕ, 0 < n ∧ G ≃ ZMod n := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Infinite cyclic group is isomorphic to the additive group of integers. -/
theorem infinite_cyclic_iso_int (G : Type*) [Group G] [IsCyclic G] [Infinite G] : G ≃ ℤ := by
  -- proof omitted
  sorry

/-- Finite cyclic group is isomorphic to the additive group of integers modulo n for some n > 0. -/
theorem finite_cyclic_iso_zmod (G : Type*) [Group G] [IsCyclic G] [Fintype G] : ∃ n : ℕ, 0 < n ∧ (G ≃ ZMod n) := by
  -- proof omitted
  sorry
